text: On the bed in the bedroom, there is a love letter addressed to the victim. You mark the location of the letter with an appropriate description, photo, and clue number. What should be done with them next?
option1: You search for fingerprints and find several; then, you secure everything.
option2: You hide the letter and do not secure it.
option3: You take the letter and read it, then you look for fingerprints.
option4: You walk away and do nothing.
